title: TENSION & ACTION - Active Music Loops
description: 20 powerful loops for engrossing action gaming
longDescription:
20 powerful loops for engrossing action gaming


Preview on Soundcloud

Preview on YouTube


Introducing our new music pack for creators of intense and active games. We made music with which your audience will definitely not get bored.


There are only 20 loops in this library, but we have worked hard on them and carefully crafted them so that you can create the most captivating storytelling with cinematic quality from them.


With these loops, you can make your player completely immerse himself in the game and forget about everything. You will make him tremble and worry about the impending danger thanks to serious suspense loops. And action loops will not let players relax during active and resolute actions, no matter how long they last.


This action music library includes:

- 8 suspense loops (tense and suspenseful atmosphere), duration - 0:51 min each

- 12 action loops (dynamic and highly energetic mood), duration - 1:42 min each


Check the full asset list HERE and short preview HERE


For your convenience, we have indicated the main tone of the music in the titles, so you can easily select the most appropriate sequence of loops. Also, all compositions are performed at the same tempo (150/75 bpm). This will allow you to create a smooth soundtrack without sudden jumps and will not distract players from your exciting game.




___Below is garbage text for search engines, you can not read further___


With “Tension & Action” sound library Polysonic Audio brings you a versatile, high quality, energetic cinematic action sound arsenal ranging from massive, sub, braam and riser sound effects, powerful, vigorous, mighty, thriller-like soundtrack and tension-building atmospheres, to the heavy drums and floating brass, dramatic orchestra, vibrant modern rhythms, hair-raising, suspense ambience that will easily find a way into your next movie, game, trailer, video, music track, and more! 


Perfect for any production involving battle and war scenes of destroyed cities, combat adventures, haunting, dangerous streets and landscapes, extreme chase, pursuit or cyber race with shooting, skirmish with criminals or special forces, team shooter, futuristic sci-fi experience and fatal, deadly fight. This professionally designed sound library will provide you with a vast variety of loops, action music, suspense atmospheres, and tense music tracks that will bring sonic perspective to scenes and images of a fearful and stressful action events, full of resolute and intense tactical moves.


Tags: action suspense loops shooter race extreme cyber modern thriller сombat battle war dangerous tenet fighting cinematic futuristic sci-fi dynamic serious damaged rhythmic powerful chase pursuit driving ride run tactical force vigorous active energetic
technicalDetails:
FEATURES:

  • 8 suspense loops 
  • 12 action loops
  • The same tempo for all tracks - 150 bpm 
  • Perfect transitions from the end of a loop to the beginning
  • High quality audio
  • Ready-to-use sounds


Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: ~28

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Asset List
